## About Me

Hello! My name is Jake Greenberg (he/him). Welcome to my website!

## Education:

I am currently enrolled in my last semester of courses at Macalester College, where I am majoring in Economics and minoring in Statistics.

## Hobbies:

In my free time, I enjoy both watching and playing sports, especially baseball. I also really enjoy playing board games, such as Settlers of Catan and Monopoly.
